sources.title: Point Blank (1998) - Full Movie
sources.description:
Mickey Rourke and Danny Trejo star in this action-packed drama about a gang of psychotic criminals who break out of prison and take control of a Texas shopping mall.

#freemovies #moviesondemand #fullmovie

metadata.Plot: Convicted corporate criminal Howard engineers a prison break as he and a number of fellow inmates are being transferred to a new facility. The escapees storm a shopping mall and take a group of shoppers hostage (after killing many more of them) before making their demands. Only Rudy, a former mercenary and brother of one of the fugitives, can take out the criminals before more of the hostages die.
metadata.Writer: James Bannon, Chuck Konzelman, Daniel Raskov
metadata.Actors: Mickey Rourke, Danny Trejo, Frederic Forrest
